id_table_9.caption: TABLE IX: A summary of frequently used notations.
table:
Notation Description
xi3Dsubscriptsuperscript𝑥3D𝑖x^{\text{3D}}_{i} ∈ℝ3absentsuperscriptℝ3\in\mathbb{R}^{3} Coordinate vector of the i𝑖i-th 3D object point
xi2Dsubscriptsuperscript𝑥2D𝑖x^{\text{2D}}_{i} ∈ℝ2absentsuperscriptℝ2\in\mathbb{R}^{2} Coordinate vector of the i𝑖i-th 2D image point
wi2Dsubscriptsuperscript𝑤2D𝑖w^{\text{2D}}_{i} ∈ℝ+2absentsubscriptsuperscriptℝ2\in\mathbb{R}^{2}_{+} Weight vector of the i𝑖i-th 2D-3D point pair
X𝑋X The set of weighted 2D-3D correspondences
y𝑦y Object pose
ygtsubscript𝑦gty_{\text{gt}} Ground truth of object pose
y∗superscript𝑦∗y^{\ast} Object pose estimated by the PnP solver
R𝑅R 3×3 rotation matrix representation of object orientation
θ𝜃\theta 1D yaw angle representation of object orientation
l𝑙l Unit quaternion representation of object orientation
t𝑡t ∈ℝ3absentsuperscriptℝ3\in\mathbb{R}^{3} Translation vector representation of object position
Σy∗subscriptΣsuperscript𝑦∗\Sigma_{y^{\ast}} Pose covariance estimated by the PnP solver
J𝐽J Jacobian matrix
J~~𝐽\tilde{J} Rescaled Jacobian matrix
F𝐹F Concatenated vector of weighted reprojection errors of all points
F~~𝐹\tilde{F} Concatenated vector of rescaled weighted reprojection errors of all points
π​(⋅)𝜋⋅\pi(\cdot) :ℝ3→ℝ2:absent→superscriptℝ3superscriptℝ2:\mathbb{R}^{3}\rightarrow\mathbb{R}^{2} Camera projection function
fi​(y)subscript𝑓𝑖𝑦f_{i}(y) ∈ℝ2absentsuperscriptℝ2\in\mathbb{R}^{2} Weighted reprojection error of the i𝑖i-th correspondence at pose y𝑦y
ri​(y)subscript𝑟𝑖𝑦r_{i}(y) ∈ℝ2absentsuperscriptℝ2\in\mathbb{R}^{2} Unweighted reprojection error of the i𝑖i-th correspondence at pose y𝑦y
ρ​(⋅)𝜌⋅\rho(\cdot) Huber kernel function
ρi′subscriptsuperscript𝜌′𝑖\rho^{\prime}_{i} The derivative of the Huber kernel function of the i𝑖i-th correspondence
δ𝛿\delta The Huber threshold
p​(X|y)𝑝conditional𝑋𝑦p(X|y) Likelihood function of object pose
p​(y)𝑝𝑦p(y) PDF of the prior pose distribution
p​(y|X)𝑝conditional𝑦𝑋p(y|X) PDF of the posterior pose distribution
t​(y)𝑡𝑦t(y) PDF of the target pose distribution
q​(y),qt​(y)𝑞𝑦subscript𝑞𝑡𝑦q(y),q_{t}(y) PDF of the proposal pose distribution (of the t𝑡t-th AMIS iteration)
yj,yjtsubscript𝑦𝑗superscriptsubscript𝑦𝑗𝑡y_{j},y_{j}^{t} The j𝑗j-th random pose sample (of the t𝑡t-th AMIS iteration)
vj,vjtsubscript𝑣𝑗superscriptsubscript𝑣𝑗𝑡v_{j},v_{j}^{t} Importance weight of the j𝑗j-th pose sample (of the t𝑡t-th AMIS iteration)
i𝑖i Index of 2D-3D point pair
j𝑗j Index of random pose sample
t𝑡t Index of AMIS iteration
N𝑁N Number of 2D-3D point pairs in total
K𝐾K Number of pose samples in total
T𝑇T Number of AMIS iterations
K′superscript𝐾′K^{\prime} Number of pose samples per AMIS iteration
nheadsubscript𝑛headn_{\text{head}} Number of heads in the deformable correspondence network
nhptssubscript𝑛hptsn_{\text{hpts}} Number of points per head in the deformable correspondence network
ℒKLsubscriptℒKL\mathcal{L}_{\text{KL}} KL divergence loss for object pose
ℒtgtsubscriptℒtgt\mathcal{L}_{\text{tgt}} The component of ℒKLsubscriptℒKL\mathcal{L}_{\text{KL}} concerning the reprojection errors at target pose
ℒpredsubscriptℒpred\mathcal{L}_{\text{pred}} The component of ℒKLsubscriptℒKL\mathcal{L}_{\text{KL}} concerning the reprojection errors over predicted pose
ℒregsubscriptℒreg\mathcal{L}_{\text{reg}} Derivative regularization loss
